fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Speed-Up**; Pick a target, All abilities used against them will be delayed for the next night.
- **Scare**: Pick a target, Their action will be delayed by a day and all actions against them are processed as soon as they are sent. (2 uses)
- **Goop**: Secretly cover someone's will in slime, making it unreadable when they die, this lasts indefinitely. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A slimy will can be reversed by a heal, purge or any similar effects.
- Your **Speed-Up** isn't affected by its own effects, Your **Scare** ability will process instantly, you may queue it at day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose Lord Bowser.
